ModMetaData.name: Jelly's Better Map Sizes [Semi OCD Edition]
ModMetaData.author: Jellypowered
ModMetaData.description:
Updated and customized continuation of Madara Uchiha's Custom Map Sizes for RimWorld 1.6.
• Choose any vanilla size or define your own width/height directly from the Advanced game config. • "Use saved default" lets you quickly revert to your preferred size for new colonies. • "Make default" saves the current selection for future games (no more forgetting to open Advanced). • OCD presets: additional odd-dimension maps that are an equal number of tiles from the center crosshair (e.g. 101×101 = 50 tiles, 151×151 = 75, 201×201 = 100, 251×251, 301×301, 351×351).
Notes • Affects only new map generation; existing saves are unchanged. • Extremely large maps can impact performance—use to taste.
Credits • Based on and inspired by Madara Uchiha’s "Custom Map Sizes". • Requires Harmony.
